text: The End of the Road is a 1976 British short documentary film directed by John Armstrong. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *Watch The End of the Roadwe at BP Video Library * Category:1976 films Category:British films Category:English-language films Category:1970s short documentary films Category:British short documentary films
title: The End of the Road (1976 film)
